3、竞争（competition）：淘宝涉及各行各业，竞争激烈。要想胜出那么我们需要分析竞争对手，我们首先要知道对手谁，寻找到与自己相.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from Latin competit- 'striven for', from the verb competere (see compete) + -ive

entry.def: Competitive is used to describe situations or activities in which people or firms compete with each other.

example.ex: Only by keeping down costs will America maintain its competitive advantage over other countries...
example.tran: 只有通过控制成本，美国才能保持对其他国家的竞争优势。

example.ex: Japan is a highly competitive market system...
example.tran: 日本实行竞争激烈的市场体制。

entry.def: A competitive person is eager to be more successful than other people.

example.ex: He has always been ambitious and fiercely competitive...
example.tran: 他一直都雄心勃勃，而且极其好胜。

example.ex: I'm a very competitive person and I was determined not be beaten.
example.tran: 我非常要强，下定决心不能输给别人。

entry.def: Goods or services that are at a competitive price or rate are likely to be bought, because they are less expensive than other goods of the same kind.

example.ex: Only those homes offered for sale at competitive prices will secure interest from serious purchasers.
example.tran: 只有那些价格优惠的住房才会引起真想买房的人的兴趣。

example.ex: ...a travel company specialising in amazingly competitive rates for flights.
example.tran: 专门提供极优惠航班折扣的旅游公司

means.word_mean: 3. showing a fighting disposition without self-seeking;

stems_affixes.word_buile: centri=centr中心+pet追+al……的→追求中心的→向心的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有能力的,能胜任的;足够的
竞争的;好竞争的;[价格等的]有竞争力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compete[v.比赛,竞争]+itive……的→adj.竞争的;好竞争的;[价格等的]有竞争力的
per全部永久+pet追求,寻求+ual……的→追求永久的
pet追求,寻求+ulant多……的→追求太多,导致脾气不好
pro前+piti=pet追求,寻求+ous……的→在[别人]前面追到→幸运的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 食欲,胃口;欲望,性欲;爱好,趣味
stems_affixes.word_buile: ap一再+pet追求,寻求+ite表名词→一再追求→有胃口
appet=appetite胃口+izer东西→n.开胃食品,开胃物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 能力,胜任某种工作的资格
stems_affixes.word_buile: competent[[adj.有能力的,能胜任的;足够的]]省鷑.能力,胜任某种工作的资格
compete[v.比赛,竞争]+ition表名词→n.竞争, 竞赛
pet追求,寻求+ition表名词→追寻状态→请愿[词性变化:可做动词]
petition[n.请愿书,申请书 v.[向…]请愿,正式请求]+er人→n.请愿人
per全部,永久+pet追求,寻求+uate=ate表动词→追求永久
pet追求,寻求+ition表名词→追寻状态→请愿[词性变化:可做动词]
pro前+piti=pet追求,寻求+ate表动词→追到前面去→获宠爱
